name: Combustion Analysis Tool
short_description: Combustion analysis of internal combustion engine in-cylinder pressure data. For use in the development, calibration and modelling of internal combustion engines. Compatible with data recorded with AVL Indiwin/Indimaster/Indiset I-File format.
